pageContent: Introduction: The purpose of this analysis was to provide a better understanding of the experiences of partners of prostate cancer survivors. Concerns and needs of women who are partners of prostate cancer survivors are often not acknowledged or addressed in clinical practice. By increasing their awareness of the impact of this situation on women, primary health care providers can offer more holistic, individualized, woman-centered care.

metaData.source:
Phase I/II study of a five-fraction hypofractionated accelerated radiotherapy treatment for low-risk localised prostate cancer: early results of pHART3
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/18838256/
